ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
OR( AND( Inform_Siemens__c=TRUE , NOT(ISPICKVAL( Fleet__c , "E320"))) ,
AND( Inform_Siemens__c=TRUE , ISPICKVAL( Fleet__c , "E320"), ISBLANK( EIL_Lead_Investigator__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: To inform Siemens, you must select the E320 fleet AND and EIL Lead Investigator
